title: Liverpool duo Daniel Sturridge and Dejan Lovren doubtful for Reds' trip to Leicester on Monday night
text:

Liverpool pair Daniel Sturridge and Dejan Lovren are major doubts for Monday's trip to champions Leicester City. 
Striker Sturridge, 27, and centre-back Lovren, also 27, were both absent from training at Melwood on Thursday. 
Lovren has missed the Reds' last two matches with a knee injury and remains sidelined after seeing a specialist in Germany earlier this week. 
Sturridge, meanwhile, is yet to recover from the virus which led to him being sent home early from Liverpool's training camp in La Manga. Read More Sturridge is still recovering from a virus (Photo: John Powell) Lovren has missed Liverpool's last two matches with a knee problem (Photo: Reuters) 
The England forward will be assessed again on Friday. 
The rest of the Liverpool squad escaped the strong winds and heavy rain as Storm Doris gave Melwood a battering. 
After a gruelling outdoor session on Wednesday, Klopp had already taken the decision that his players would only be involved in a light session indoors on Thursday. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
